main event: Two unidentified aircraft were observed by radar at Pepperrell AFB on 27 July 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes,Two objects were tracked on radar with a course of 270 degrees,The objects were initially considered as possibly being balloons or aircraft,The sighting was documented under the Project Blue Book,The observation involved air radar at a military base.
witness description: Observation was made via Air Radar with no confirmed eyewitnesses noted.
